name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Cloud Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance cloud-native systems. Proficient in **Azure**, including expertise in **Infrastructure as Code** using **Terraform**, **ARM Templates**, and **Bicep**. Demonstrated knowledge of **Zero-Trust Security** principles, utilizing tools such as **Defender for Cloud** and **Sentinel**. Skilled in integrating **Microsoft 365** into robust cloud infrastructures. Additionally, I possess hands-on experience as a Full Stack Developer with strong capabilities in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I have delivered solutions aligning with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, while implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD processes.
